summary: Story about a friendship between two lonely, opposite souls. One is a 81-year-old grumpy widower and the other an insecure eighteen-year-old refugee from Sudan.
cast: John Kon Kelei|Jan Munter|Willem Smit|Ingeborg Uyt den Boogaard|Deng Barac Atem|Cynthia Abma|Mochir Awein Akol|Sabit Asholi|Miep Bos|Reinier Bulder|Nicknora Gongich Chol|Elias Errami|Sarah Errami|Yolanda Gordon|Eugene Heuvel|Nezha Karim|Mevr. Keesom|Shogi Lado|Ahmed Salah Larbi|Mevr. Luchies|Alom Gabriel Makur|Yoep Man|Henri Peterwia|Rose Abang Rehan|Rok Rok|Ahmed Salah|Adual Thel|Adut Thel|Rogier van de Weerd|Paul Vlielander
title: Tussenland
